qas.question: When do you need to take a pcr test when coming from a red list country?

answers.text: within 72 hours of arrival in Qatar

qas.question: What does a fully vaccinated resident need to take within 72 hours of arrival in qatar?

paragraphs.context: Fully vaccinated residents returning from a red listed country need to undertake a pre-departure PCR test within 72 hours of arrival in Qatar

qas.question: Travelling to qatar after 25th april 2021, who will be exempt from quarantine?

paragraphs.context: From 25 April 2021, all residents returning to Qatar will be exempt from quarantine provided they have completed a vaccination course as recognised by MoPH Qatar (
